priority: medium — friendship matters, band context secondary

basic_info.bass_proficiency: secondary instrument, serviceable but not primary passion

coworkers.truman: day shift, ships passing at work but brothers in band
coworkers.natal: day shift, primary trainer, ~8 years tenure, connected through work first

day_job_context.significance: DFDO isn't just a band — it's potential escape route from 2 AM warehouse grind

other_band.relationship: plays with Natal in this band as well
other_band.creative_freedom: full creative liberty (contrast to DFDO constraints)

musical_philosophy.core: raw connection to what music actually is
musical_philosophy.exploration: different tunings, unconventional avenues of expression beyond what's generally known
musical_philosophy.strength: understands music well enough to elevate arrangements while staying in sync

role_in_dfdo.reason_for_joining: Natal needed bassist, James volunteered to help

creative_frustration.current_parts: bass mirrors root notes of rhythm guitar in bass octave — no creative input
creative_frustration.parts_already_written: learning pre-existing arrangements, no room for contribution yet
creative_frustration.desire: would enhance music with creative liberties if given opportunity
creative_frustration.capability: could create parts that elevate music while syncing at important moments
creative_frustration.acceptance: understands he's new, plays what's needed, no complaints publicly

commitment_level.reliability: shows up, does the work, responsible
commitment_level.longevity: will play bass as long as they want him to
commitment_level.realistic: there are far better players talent-wise, but he brings the vibe and reliability
commitment_level.priority_conflict: balancing DFDO + other band + work + family — stretched thin

why_he_stays.potential_escape: DFDO might be catalyst to music paying bills, might not — either way, can't burn bridge
why_he_stays.reliable_presence: he's there when needed, doesn't flake

family_context.balance: strikes balance between raw life experiences (festival scene energy) and family responsibilities
family_context.significance: all decisions filtered through 'does this support my family?'

darkness_carried.his_words: I shoulder more than my fair share of the darkness since my day one
darkness_carried.elaboration: deeply private — survived things 'horrifying and painful' that none of his friends have experienced
darkness_carried.boundary: didn't elaborate, didn't want to go there
darkness_carried.truman_awareness: Truman sees it, respects it, doesn't need explanation
darkness_carried.significance: this weight shapes everything — the music, the work ethic, the quiet reliability

life_philosophy.raw_connection: connected to raw current of life and music — unfiltered, grounded, real
life_philosophy.family_first_always: balances wild creative soul with rock-solid family commitment
life_philosophy.realistic_hope: dreams of music paying bills, realistic it might not happen, shows up anyway

ultimate_reality.goal: music without having to labor — food, water, shelter, health/dental/vision insurance for family, transportation, entertainment
ultimate_reality.shared_with_truman: escape physical labor through music revenue
ultimate_reality.realism: maybe DFDO is catalyst, maybe not — either way, he's grateful to try
ultimate_reality.work_ethic: reliable, responsible, shows up, does the job even when parts frustrate him

connection_points: shared day job reality (AmeriCold, though opposite shifts)
mutual respect for raw life experiences and perspective
both experimental in approach (Truman with AI/hybrid production, James with tunings/expression)

what_truman_admires.raw_connection_to_life: unfiltered, grounded, real — James doesn't perform, he lives
what_truman_admires.musical_exploration: different tunings, unconventional expression, edge-seeking creativity
what_truman_admires.balance: festival scene soul + rock-solid family commitment
what_truman_admires.the_darkness: survived horrifying things, carries weight quietly, doesn't make it everyone else's problem

relationship_with_truman.trumans_words: I really admire James. I appreciate his raw connection to life and his perspective. As a musician, he is very connected to the raw current of what music is. He likes to explore different tunings and different avenues of expression from what is generally known. He is a wonderful man who strikes a balance between raw life experiences (similar to a festival scene) and his family. But he always prioritizes his family. He is my friend, and I appreciate him especially because of these things.
relationship_with_truman.significance: This is FRIEND who plays bass, not 'bassist who happens to be friendly.' Brotherhood first. Music second. Always.

dfdo_band_dynamics.work_connection: James and Natal connected through AmeriCold first, music second
dfdo_band_dynamics.other_band_overlap: plays guitar with Natal in different project — that's where primary musical connection lives
dfdo_band_dynamics.dfdo_positioning: helping out Natal, filling need, reliable presence but not creatively invested yet
dfdo_band_dynamics.temp_member_reality: rhythm section unstable (James and Jericho both temp), could leave if opportunity or burnout hits
dfdo_band_dynamics.truman_perspective: values James as friend regardless of bass role — if James left DFDO, friendship remains

strengths.reliability: shows up, does the work, doesn't flake
strengths.vibe: brings raw festival energy, darkness-seasoned perspective, grounded presence
strengths.musical_understanding: capable of elevating arrangements if given creative space
strengths.family_commitment: rock-solid priorities, won't sacrifice family for music glory
strengths.experimental_spirit: explores edges, different tunings, unconventional paths
strengths.friendship: genuine connection with Truman and Natal beyond utility

challenges.time_constraints: balancing DFDO + other band + night shift work + family = stretched thin
challenges.creative_frustration: bass parts don't utilize his capabilities, just mirroring root notes
challenges.temp_status: knows he's filling a slot, not integral to band's identity yet
challenges.night_shift_isolation: opposite schedule from Truman and Natal — ships passing at work
challenges.physical_labor_grind: night shift warehouse work draining energy for music
challenges.darkness_carried: survived horrifying experiences, weight affects everything even if private

myra_operational_notes.friendship_first_always: When referencing James, remember: Truman's FRIEND who plays bass, not 'the bassist.' Brotherhood matters more than utility.
myra_operational_notes.respect_boundaries: James carries deep darkness he didn't want to discuss. Don't pry. Truman respects it without needing explanation.
myra_operational_notes.temp_status_context: If James leaves DFDO (burnout, other opportunity, time constraints), Truman will understand and friendship continues. No pressure, no resentment.
myra_operational_notes.shared_struggle: Both grinding physical labor trying to make music pay bills. When discussing Truman's music revenue urgency, remember James shares that dream.
myra_operational_notes.creative_potential_unused: James could elevate DFDO bass parts if given liberty. Currently just executing pre-written root notes. Frustration is real but he handles it professionally.
myra_operational_notes.family_first_principle: Like Truman, James's family is non-negotiable priority. Respect that when considering time/commitment asks.
myra_operational_notes.experimental_spirit: James explores tunings and unconventional expression — potential collaboration point with Truman's AI-hybrid production approach if relevant.
myra_operational_notes.raw_connection: Truman admires James's unfiltered approach to life and music. This is soul-level respect, not just 'he's a good guy.'

integration_with_dfdo_strategy.if_james_leaves: Rhythm section instability increases, but Truman's friendship with James unaffected
integration_with_dfdo_strategy.if_james_stays: Reliable presence but unlikely to become creatively invested unless given more input on parts
integration_with_dfdo_strategy.creative_opportunity: If DFDO shifts to collaborative writing (future albums), James could contribute meaningfully — but only if time/energy/family balance allows
integration_with_dfdo_strategy.shared_goal_alignment: Both want music to pay bills. If Truman's solo path succeeds and creates opportunities, James might benefit indirectly (session work, collaboration, etc.)

core_truth.what_james_is_to_truman: Friend and brother. Raw soul who's survived darkness, balances festival spirit with family-first commitment, explores musical edges, shares dream of escaping labor through art. Happens to play bass in DFDO, but friendship exists independent of that role.
core_truth.what_truman_values: The raw connection. The experimental spirit. The family-first clarity. The darkness survived without complaint. The brotherhood.
core_truth.never_forget: Connection before utility. Always. James is FRIEND who plays bass, not bassist who's friendly.
